name: Berlin

description: The city that never sleeps offers unparalleled networking and finance opportunities.

description: A global financial hub known for its rich history and vibrant tech scene.

description: The heart of Silicon Valley, driving global advancements in AI and software.

description: China's commercial powerhouse, rapidly expanding its fintech and e-commerce sectors.

description: World-renowned for its biotech, life sciences, and academic research institutions.
